title: One Bert Show Member Ruined A Listener's Marriage?!
description:
One listener reached out seeking advice after a Bert Show member caused some tension in her marriage. What's the problem? Her husband has a problem with a message she sent online.
It was an innocent message, but her husband feels disrespected. So what does she do?
